estate_title: Sprawling Agricultural Land with River Frontage
description: Expansive agricultural land spanning 100 acres, featuring direct river frontage, fertile soil, and excellent farming infrastructure. Perfect for farming or development purposes.

estate_title: Organic Farm with Vineyard and Orchard
description: Charming organic farm nestled in the countryside, boasting a thriving vineyard, lush orchard, and farmhouse. Perfect for those seeking a self-sufficient lifestyle.

estate_title: Secluded Forest Retreat with Mountain Views
description: Escape to this secluded forest retreat, featuring pristine woodlands, breathtaking mountain views, and abundant wildlife. Ideal for nature lovers seeking tranquility.

estate_title: Historic Tea Plantation with Colonial Estate
description: Own a piece of history with this historic tea plantation, complete with a beautifully restored colonial estate and lush tea fields. Experience the charm of a bygone era.
Invest in this prime farmland with a sophisticated irrigation system, perfect for crop cultivation or agricultural development. The ideal location for your farming venture.

estate_title: Tranquil Forest Haven with Private Lake
description: Discover serenity in this tranquil forest haven, complete with towering trees, a pristine private lake, and a rustic cabin retreat. Perfect for a private getaway or eco-resort development.

estate_title: Picturesque Horse Farm with Equestrian Facilities
description: Live your equestrian dream on this picturesque horse farm, featuring spacious pastures, a state-of-the-art stable, and charming farmhouse. An ideal setting for breeding or training.
